description: From the hit show Mai-Hime and master sculptor Sakurasaka Mikoto comes the elegant and intelligent Natsuki Kuga in a bold yet dignified stance befitting both her outward strength and inner kindness.  This top-quality figure also goes well with her co-star Mai, scheduled for later release.
name: Natsuki Kuga (くがなつき)

subtitle: The legendary group of six is back!
description: First sold in August of 2005, GSC's first trading figure set made quite a splash with its superb quality and helped to establish GSC's now stellar reputation.  Now that legendary trading figure set is being reissued for general sale!Six characters, Saber, Rin Tohsaka, Archer, Rider, Ilya, and Sakura Matou, make up the all-star lineup, and are on sale now!
name: Fate/stay night Trading Figures (ふぇいとすていないつ とれーでぃんぐふぃぎゅあ)
sculptor: Saber&Archer = Mirano, Rider = YOSHI, Ilya = Kawahara Takayuki (ALTER), Sakura = Tokunaga Hironori (ALTER), Rin + Secret = Hiroshi Inagaki (ALTER)

subtitle: Even the captain is in a swimsuit?!
description: Following the release of Kaname Chidori from the popular anime "Full Metal Panic? Fumoffu", comes a PVC figure of Teletha Testarossa. Teletha Testarossa (aka Tessa) has arrived in an unruly school swimsuit!
name: Teletha Testarossa Swimsuit Ver. (てれさてっさろっさ みずぎばーじょん)
copyright: © 賀東招二・四季童子／陣代高校生徒会

subtitle: Bright eyed and bushy-tailed! A highschool girl with a rocket launcher?!
description: A swimsuit and a rocket launcher in the same figure -  a view you will only ever see modeled by the beautiful Kaname Chidori, the normally reliable high school student, who has now been sculpted into this figure in her swimsuit. She is giving a wonderfully refreshing smile and her body's beautiful curves are easily noticeable through her swimsuit. The items she holds emphasize her lively nature. Enjoy the fresh ideas behind the figure!
name: Kaname Chidori (ちどりかなめ)
copyright: © 賀東招二・四季童子／陣代高校生徒会

subtitle: One-hit kill!  Excelion Buster A.C.S!
description: From Lyrical Nanoha A's, Nanoha Takamachi follows the earlier Fate Testarossa figure onto the scene, prototyped once again by master sculptor Kazushi Kawasaki.  Clad in her Sacred Mode Barrier Jacket, Nanoha cuts a gallant figure as she prepares to take on her next opponent, exhibiting both her strength and graceful motion.  If Fate was defined by her calm demeanour, Nanoha is certainly defined by her energy and constant motion.  Display both heroines together for the full anime effect!
name: Nanoha Takamachi (たかまちなのは)
copyright: © なのは A's PROJECT All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A single figure with 2 completely different types of equipment!! Part of the 35MAX series!!
description: Max Factory's VOTOMS action figure series is proud to announce the "35MAX SERIES06: Standing Turtle". The highlight of this figure is its ability to change from the "Standing Turtle" to the "Standing Tortoise MK II" simply by exchanging the various parts that come included with the figure! You can also exchange parts with any other figures in the series. It's one figure with 2 completely different types of equipment!The Swampy Crag legs have ball joints to allow many different poses to be taken, and the flamethrower is included. The Tortoise MK II's shoulder missile pods can be rotated and moved.
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 06 : Standing Turtle (Standing Tortoise MK II) (すたんでぃんぐたーとる)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Kazuo Kawahata)

subtitle: Are They Really Cursed Cat Panties?!
description: She's a tsundere magical girl, and a maid as well! She has all the elements to make any guy in this world exited! From the popular series "Majikano" comes Ayumi Mamiya - sculpted in her maid uniform that she is forced to use in the main character's house. In order to educate the useless Haruo into being a true man, she continues to serve him. We won't show you unless you purchase the figure, but are those cat panties under her skirt? It's really worth a look!! We hope you enjoy it...
name: Ayumi Mamiya (まみやあゆみ)
copyright: © 2005　百瀬武昭・講談社／マジカノ製作委員会

subtitle: Ypsilon's Machine! The prototype AT designed for the perfect soldier is here!
description: Max Factory's VOTOMS action figure series is proud to announce the "35MAX SERIES05" "Strikedog". Designed by the Secret Society, the Blood Sucker was a new experimental H-class AT. It was the first machine to be developed specifically for perfect soldiers from its basic design stages. This machine appeared in VOTOMS from the end of the Kummen storyline to the Sunsa storyline as a machine that only Ypsilon used. It's covered in blue paint, with a huge iron claw, and the thruster backpack that made interstellar combat possible.The above mentioned iron claw is moveable, and it's also possible to replace both the left and right arms with common arm parts. It’s equipped with the large solid shooter and a thruster, which make it makes a truly fascinating AT.
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 05 Strikedog (すとらいくどっく)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Shinji Koshinuma)

subtitle: The one who calls herself the Protector of Mankind...
description: From the popular PC game "Jingai Makyou" comes Ignis, the self proclaimed "Protector of Mankind", as a PVC figure brought to you by Orchid Seed.Ignis has already been released by other figure making companies, but this sculpt has a unique, soft image, which makes effective use of space by using a lengthwise standing position, and gives an overall impression of the highest quality.As an interesting addition, you can replace the parts around the breast area.The sculpting done by Satoshi Ishiyama truly is something to see - he's already featured in specialized magazines, and looking at his work you'll know why. Now that Good Smile Company has put this figure on the production line, we hope you enjoy it!
name: Ignis (いぐにす)

subtitle: Everything is for her master...  she is a maid that will continue to fight.
description: From the popular 2D fighting game "Samurai Shodown VI", comes the popular fighting maid character "Iroha", who has been sculpted as part of Art Storm's LILICS series. She uses her skills from the Hourin Ousai fighting school to repay the kindness of her master, and her fighting form was captured in a limited edition garage kit created by popular sculpting group Cerberus Project. Now that kit has finally been released as a PVC figure. Her true form is that of the crane, and this charming pose allows you to see that side of her too.
name: Iroha (いろは)
copyright:
© SNK PLAYMORE
※『サムライスピリッツ』は株式会社SNKプレイモアの登録商標です。

subtitle: Kotona in her swimsuit!
description: From the 2005 anime that broadcast on TV Tokyo "Zoid's Genesis", comes one of the two heroines: Kotona Elegance! Sculptor Chieri has taken a famous illustration that featured in Megami Magazine, and turned it into a figure! During the 2006 Winter WonFes, it was sold as a garage kit only, but now you can get the PVC masterpiece that featured on the front cover of Figure Maniax Vol.20! She is holding a clear blue tube, which generates a very refreshing scene, and her sensuous bodyline has been miraculously sculpted. We bring the attractive Kotona to you!
name: Kotona Elegance (ことな・えれがんす)

subtitle: The anime has finally begun to air! A re-release of this figure to celebrate!
description: The anime version of the popular "Kodomo no Jikan" has just started to air. By popular demand the figure of the main heroine, Rin Kokonoe has once again been re-released! The popular position from the front cover of the original manga has been taken by sculptor Chieri and made into a very expressive figure. Looking at the situation of Rin picking up her text book, somehow seems to make your heart beat. Would you become a teacher if you had a girl that matured this fast in your class?
name: Rin Kokonoe (ここのえりん)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル/こどものじかん製作委員会

subtitle: The 2nd figure from the "Shining Project"! The Ice Witch!
description: Part of the combined project from Sega, Max Factory and Hobby Japan, the "Shining Project". Based on the popular game "Shining Tears" comes the second in the project "Blanc Neige", the cool and charming character - and also the most popular of them all! Just like the previously introduced Elwyn, she was also drawn my popular illustrator Tony. His illustration was taken by Hiiru Saitou and faithfully sculpted into a figure. She's holding up her breasts, and her hair is made from clear plastic with a pearl coating, giving it a transparent and high class feeling. Lots of attention was paid to the low-cut pants line. It's a figure loaded with promise, of a cool girl in a bold swimsuit. We hope you like it.
name: Blanc Neige (ぶらんねーじゅ)

subtitle: Eukanaria, The selfish demon with an F cup is here!
description: Since 2002, Izumi Kawachi has had his manga "Enchanter" serialized in Monthly Gangan Wing. From this series comes the bewitching Eukanariam, finely sculpted with a powerful presence! With an F-cup bust, a slender waist, and well-rounded hips, she's always fascinating those around her. That of course includes the main character of the series, who is always temped by her lure. Her spell books have fallen out of her bag, and are scattering all over...  even the smallest of details has had lots of attention paid to them, so be sure to check out this masterpiece!
name: Eukanaria (ゆうかなりあ)

subtitle: The third Nendoroid, Mesousa, is here!
description: Created by the mysterious sculptor Nendoron, the Nendoroid series sees its third entry in Mesousa, the chronically depressed, constantly weeping rabbit from the anime Pani Poni Dash!  Though he is only a supporting character, his unusual demeanour and bevy of injuries make quite an impact during the show.  Equipped with a rich variety of alternate parts and accompanied by his friends the Cat God and Giant Salamander, this set is fun to play with or display anywhere from your desk to your dinner table.
name: Nendoroid Mesousa (めそうさ　ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 氷川へきる／スクウェアエニックス・ぱにぽに製作委員会

subtitle: Now you can have your very own silver Death Note!
description: From the much-discussed TV anime Death Note comes this sterling silver pendant rendition of the main character's infamous Death Note, which he used to throw the world into chaos.  The book lies open to the memorable "how to use it" instructional page, engraved in great detail befitting high-quality accessory. Look forward to more Good Smile Company accessories coming soon!
name: Death Note Pendant (ですのーとぺんだんと)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: Watch as her Bardiche Assault slices through the air!
description: Fate Testarossa, one of the heroines of Lyrical Nanoha A's, wields her sword, the Bardiche Assault, in this exciting battle scene.  Her hair and cloak fly out behind her, tiny frame carried along with the huge sword's lightning edge.  Though her pose is daring and brash, her face is calm, demonstrating her incredible inner strength and force of will.  This figure also matches the upcoming Nanoha Takamachi, and includes a display pedestal etched with her magic circle.
name: Fate Testarossa (ふぇいと・てっさろっさ)
copyright: © なのは A's PROJECT All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A shopping bag in her hand, Sakura's on her way home!
description: Sakura Matou, the fourth in our Fate/hollow ataraxia series, is here!  A contented smile plays across her face as she walks over to Shirou's house to make some tasty dinner, with love as its secret ingredient.  Her hair and school uniform skirt move slightly in the wind, combining with her well-proportioned bust to create a carefree atmosphere.  Also note the realistic plastic bag, a product of exhaustive study of the real thing.  We hope you enjoy this wonderful rendition of a beautiful girl.
name: Sakura Matou Shopping ver. (まとうさくら　ゆうしょくばーじょん)

subtitle: The beautiful, essential Mizuho Kazami is finally here from GSC!
description: From her pulled back hair and overflowing bust to the soft sensuous thighs barely contained by her bikini, Ms. Mizuho's charm cannot be denied.  Everything about this sculpt, down to her position in the clear-cast chair and the way her hand holds the detailed parfait cup, evokes a playful summer scene while still exuding a fascinating mature sensibility.  It would be no exaggeration to say that Mizuho is among the best subjects for a stunningly sexy figure such as this, and Good Smile brings nothing but the best quality to her already gorgeous visage.
name: Mizuho Kazami (かざみみずほ)

subtitle: The legendary 17th episode...  without any restraints!
description: Following the previously released 1/8 scale figures, comes the forth release in Max Factory's "Gun X Sword" series, this time as trading figures!This time, the figures were all based on episode 17, which as fans know, was a very controversial episode. All the girls are gathered together in swimsuits, posed in no-holds-barred poses!The "donkey censor" that caused an uproar is also included.They’re a bit different to the rest, but look forward to Max Factory's Gun X Sword trading figures!
name: COLLECT600 Gun X Sword #17 (がんそーど)
sculptor: Max Factory (Yuuji Kudou - Masanori Kuroda - Tetsuya Yamada - Shinji Koshinuma)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: The 1st figure from the "Shining Project"! The daughter of the Forest God!
description: Part of the combined project from Sega, Max Factory and Hobby Japan, the "Shining Project". The first release! From the popular game "Shining Tears" comes Elwyn, one of the heroines of the story. Originally drawn by the popular illustrator Tony, the figure has been sculpted faithfully to the original.  She's got her characteristic elf ears, as well as her natural leaf bikini, and a pareo around her waist which can be removed. The detailed sculpting of the feathers on her head is a must-see! Look out for the future releases in the "Shining Project"!
name: Elwyn (えるうぃん)

subtitle: The second in the GSC trading figure series!
description: This beautiful continues in the tradition of the original SMILE500 Fate series of trading figures with the same excellent sculpting and elegant coloration that garnered accolades from collectors everywhere, and also innovates with posable figures and replacement parts!  With both the popular men and women from the popular series on display, this memorable set of trading figures is sure to please.
name: SMILE 600 Fate/stay night ~collective memories~ (すまいる600　ふぇいとすていないつ)

subtitle: How about a nice date with her on a quiet day off?
description: This is the second of the Good Smile Company 1/6th scale Fate figures, but of course Saber comes first in popularity!  Slightly embarrassed in her casual attire, she still looks directly at you, and the attention to detail in her pose and dress gives the impression that she really is in the middle of a date on her day off.  Saber as a normal girl is no doubt an enticing prospect, no matter how abnormal she may be.
name: Saber Vacation Ver. (せいばー　きゅうじつばーじょん)

subtitle: This mysterious beauty appears on the night of the fourth day.
description: Though she appears in very few scenes in the game, Caren Ortenzia could be considered the main heroine based on the important role she plays in the plot development.  She stands tall, hair blowing in the wind and face calm, golden eyes seemingly focused on the viewer in this rendition, which truly captures the mysterious air surrounding the character.  She is the third 1/6th scale Fate/hollow ataraxia figure from GSC, and truly a fine addition to any collection.
name: Caren Ortenzia Prologue ver. (かれん・おるてんしあ)

subtitle: The Eyes of Death...  And the knife that carries out their vision
description: Type Moon's Ryuugi Shiki just oozes cool in her very first figure!  Dressed in her signature kimono and leather jacket ensemble, she fights the strange things which have invaded this world.  Her deadly eyes fixed, she raises her knife as it glints in the moonlight in this dynamically posed statue.  This statue truly captures Shiki's impressive appearance, and is now ready for delivery.
name: Shiki Ryougi (りょうぎしき)

subtitle: The bright and cheerful witch with 3rd class magic!
description: A slapstick comedy anime "Renkin 3-kyuu Magical? Pokaan", which follows the story of 4 princesses from the netherland started in April 2006, and from that series comes a figure of “Yuuma”, the witch. She has been sculpted flying on her magical rod into the night sky! She's on a stand shaped as a crescent moon, with her pet the onigiri bunny with her. Would you like to go for a fly into the night skies with a young witch that forgot to put on panties?
name: Yuuma (ゆうま)
copyright: © 2005　がらくたはうす／まじぽか團

subtitle: "The Noblest Sword" has arrived as an overwhelming figure!
description: From Nitroplus's popular PC game "Jingai Makyou" comes a figure of the main heroine Ignis! Reviving the illustration from illustrator NiΘ (of Demonbane fame), took the sculptor over 4 months to perfect! Her hair and clothes have been elegantly sculpted, and her hips, neck and hair are all incredibly detailed.  Her clothes have the original butterfly pattern on them, as well as the see-through back material. Also includes glasses that can be worn, and a mirror base. It's a masterpiece with so many highlights that it's enough to make you wonder if it's real.
name: Ignis (いぐにす)

subtitle: The AT-G project, the new grand collaboration, has begun!  Lucy here is the first V.I.P figure!
description: The V.I.P (Venus Idol Project) series features beautiful girls based on drawings by popular illustrators of the AT-G artist collective on collectible trading cards.  This first figure in the series is based on art by Kawata Hisashi, which differs slightly from the official design.  Lucy Maria Misora is seen here with a very proper, almost disapproving expression befitting her character, which belies the beauty of her slender legs, which she takes pains to hide.  This original take on a popular character is sure to make any fan water at the mouth.  Don't miss your chance to have this demure beauty for your very own! We're working to expand the AT-G limited edition figure set, so be sure to check out the official AT-G website.
name: Lucy Maria Misora

subtitle: The wandering lone wolf. Van of the Dawn!
description: Following Max Factory's "Wendy" and "Carmen 99" figures from Gun X Sword, comes the third in the series, Van!He is a finely detailed figure, with parts that expresses both the strong and sorrowful parts of the character, as well as his sharp gaze. Sculptor Katou Taichi put his soul into this work - he's recreated the figure of Van rampaging on Endless Illusion, the planet of rouges.
name: Van (う゛ぁん)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: Worldly desires begone!
description: Introducing the heroine Chitose Nanbu, from the popular anime series "Amaenaideyo!!".Her three sizes are 95/58/85...  a girl with such a perfect score has been sculpted in a 1/6 scale! The same prototype sculptor who sculpted Ignis, Masato Kitade also sculpted this figure. The body line you can see underneath her robes, and her beautiful legs truly bring out her adult appeal. The string of beads can be removed, so you can display her how you prefer.  She is displayed on an artistic stand depicting a wooden floor; which really draws out the atmosphere of the figure.This work of art... its beauty cannot be displayed in pictures!
name: Chitose Nanbu (なんぶちとせ)
copyright: © 2005ボヘミアンK・宗我部としのり/ワニブックス・AT-X・VAP

subtitle: No kisses allowed. But stay right there.
description: Last year in summer, the anime "My Wife is a Magical Girl" aired, and quickly gained popularity. Max Factory now proudly announces a figure from that series - the heroine, Ureshiko Asaba! The warm, charming character is sculpted with a listless expression under her parasol. Her fine complexion is shown in her thighs, and her beautiful legs are not to be missed!"If I kiss you, you'll lose your magic power?"The wife you’re not allowed to kiss is a magical girl in pain, enjoy the figure!
name: Uresiko Asaba (あさばうれしこ)
series: My Wife is a Magical Girl
copyright: © 2005 J.C.STAFF・錦織博・池口和彦/奥さまは魔法少女製作委員会

subtitle: The first, limited edition figure in the 35MAX EX Series!!
description: Announcing the Brustish Dog from the VOTOMS 35MAX series, brought to you by Max Factory!Fans of VOTOMS will already know, but this is the Secret Society's remodeled Scopedog - a mid-class AT designed for perfect soldiers. The MC Pack system went through a large tune-up in order to increase the mobility of the machine to be above all other machines in the Scopedog series. The entire body is coordinated in red, and the right arm is equipped with heavy weapons, including the 7 barrel Gatling gun and an iron claw. In the anime, the main character Chirico has a struggle to the death in this AT, so it should have a deep meaning to fans of the series. Only 3000 copies of this figure are going to be made, so don't let your chance to get this premium item fall away!
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES Limited Edition EX-01 Brutishdog (ぶるーてぃっしゅどっく)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Takeshi Hamasaki - Takashi Morimoto)

subtitle: She's back on her lion, just as cute as ever!
description: Ah, the Nendoroids...  They're not just adorable, but fun to play with too!  Lazy Saber, largely responsible for building the series' reputation among the foremost super-deformed figures, is back for another run!  Though the series continues to press on, Lazy Saber's importance in establishing the Nendoroid brand cannot be understated.  Riding in on her lion or just swinging her sword around, the almost flat feeling of the figure makes her a perfect representative of the Nendoroid series.  Her package also includes an extra face, and she can be positioned either standing or sitting for an extra fun time.
name: Nendoroid Lazy Saber (せいばー　ねんどろいど)

subtitle: A mobile threat! Styled exactly like the original!! The 2nd in the 35MAX series!
description: From the new OVA "The Last Red Shoulder" that described the battle between Pailsen, Chirico and the other ex-red shoulders, comes the AT "Bloodsucker" that Chirico's rival Ypsilon rides.A jet black machine with red shoulders was sculpted straight from the design image. If you put this figure together with the "Scopedog Turbo Custom" that went on sale at the same time, you can recreate the scenes from the anime!Comes equipped with the Bloodsucker's customized machine gun, the "Braddy Rifle".
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 04 Bloodsucker (ぶらっどさっかー)

subtitle: 99 is an adult's charm, and its here to captivate you in a seductive position!
description: From the intense action comedy series "Gun X Sword", which aired in mid 2005, comes the mysterious girl with a 99cm bust, Carmen 99! The sculptor was Pla Guild's "See". Carmen's charm comes from her seductive position with her hand on her hips.  Her bodyline is also an important point, but all in all, she's beautifully presented!Her sexy clothing and hip area are sculpted beautifully, and should be a part of any collection!
name: Carmen99 (かるめん)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: With completely replaceable parts and moveable joints, you can recreate multiple scenes from the original!
description: The anime version of "When They Cry", has recently starts. Using the four main heroines from the series, comes five trading action figures - Rena in her original clothes, Rena in her school uniform, Mion, Satoko and Rika. They all have replaceable face parts as well as moveable joints, you can recreate all sorts of scenes! Because the sizes of the figures are the same, you can exchange the heads, upper bodies, and lower bodies between the figures! Truly a set of figures for anyone who wants some fun!
name: COLLECT700 When They Cry (ひぐらしのなくころに)
series: When They Cry (Higurashi no Naku Koro ni)

subtitle: The spoiled princess with the pumpkin skirt is back!
description: This lovely figure of Melissa Seraphy, the popular character from Unison Soft's game Wagamama Capricio, was first put on sale in July 2006, and she's now being reissued by popular demand!  Melissa herself is quite slender and sleek, with a small bust line, thrown into sharp contrast by her voluminous pumpkin skirt, a unique feature that makes Melissa truly desirable.  With a Nendoroid figure on the way, there's no better time to get your very own pumpkin-skirted beauty.
name: Melissa Seraphy (めりっさ・せらふぃ)

subtitle: Another gust of wind blew through the blue skies of Hatsune island.
description: Following the release of the "Aishia" figure from the popular anime series "D.C.S.S (Da Capo Second Season)" comes the school's idol, Kotori Shirakawa! Hatsune island's wind is blowing, and Kotori can be seen posed with her hair and blue ribbon blowing in the wind, while trying to keep her white hat on her head. If you put both the Aishia and Kotori figures together you might be able to feel the wind from Hatsune island as well!
name: Kotori Shirakawa (ことり)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department - Shinji Koshinuma - Atsushi Yagi
copyright: © CIRCUS/ダ・カーポSS製作委員会

subtitle: Hey there everyone! It's the strong-willed, ponytailed icon Eri Sawachika!
description: Here by popular demand is the lovely Ms. Sawachika, the immensely popular blonde with a wealthy family and plenty of attitude!  Her slender body in mid-stretch, hair and skirt blowing in the wind, and legs slightly spread, the beautiful Eri is sculpted in an eye-catching standing pose.  Be sure to look out for the rest of the School Rumble girls, set to be released soon!
name: Eri Sawachika (さわちか　えり)
copyright: © 小林尽/講談社・マーベラスエンターテイメント・創通エージェンシー

subtitle: As part of the BFC-MAX series, Guyver I has been re-released better than ever!
description: The popular action figure BFC-MAX5 "Kaiba I" has been re-released with a new head part, and new right arm parts! Using the new parts, you can recreate the "Torn off armor" scene from the front cover of the 5th volume! The original parts are also included, so both those who bought the previous figure and new customers can enjoy the figure!
name: Guyver I/Image Head Plus (がいばーわん)

subtitle: The first figure in the "Gun X Sword" figure series, Wendy, has arrived!
description: From the popular anime series "Gun X Sword" comes the flat-chested heroine Wendy, sculpted by BUBBA!The figure is excellently sculpted, depicting a scene where Wendy has put down her heavy bag to take a quick breather; you can almost hear her exhausted breathing. Max Factory is planning on releasing many more character figures from "Gun X Sword", so look forward to them!
name: Wendy (うぇんでぃ)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: A new member of the Nendoroids!
description: From Fate/stay night comes a Nendoroid of Lazy Saber in a special Limited Ver.!
name: Nendoroid Lazy Saber: Limited Ver. (ねんどろいど へたれ せいばーげんていVer.)

subtitle: The launch of the 35MAX Series! A mobile threat! Styled exactly like the original!
description: It's been 20 years since the original airing of "Armored Trooper VOTOMS" but it’s still as popular as ever! A new series of figures from VOTOMS has been announced, known as the 35MAX series! The first in the series is the main character Chirico's favorite machine, the "Scopedog"!  The figure was sculpted using Kunio Okawara's design, which still looks amazing even after all these years. We're on a completely different scale to the others; Max Factory will leave you satisfied! Look forward to it!
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 01 Scopedog (すこーぷどっく)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department - Takeshi Hamasaki - Atsushi Yagi

subtitle: The launch of the 35MAX Series! A mobile threat! Styled exactly like the original!
description: The new VOTOMS action figure series, 35MAX! Now that the Scopegod has been released, the "Standing Tortoise" is not far behind!!This machine appeared in the anime often... but it never had any good figures made of it. Finally Max Factory has sculpted a figure with the best proportions, and of course the handy rocket gun is also included. It can also hold the Scopedog's heavy machinegun! Look forward to the rest of the figures coming up in this series!
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 02: Standing Tortoise. (すたんでぃんぐとーたす)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department - Takeshi Hamasaki - Atsushi Yagi

subtitle: If you say she's flat-chested, you're doomed.
description: Announcing Etna, the main character from the simulation RPG "Disgaea: Hour of Darkness", identical to the resin kit that was released in 2003 by BUBBA, this figure will be available just before the anime version of the series starts airing. Summon the cute little demon into your room!
name: Etna (えとな)
copyright: © 2003 NIPPON ICHI SOFTWARE INC./暗黒議会

subtitle: The second in the 1/10th scale Mai-Hime project!
description: Continuing from the first piece in the 1/10th GSC Mai-Hime project, the lovely Natsuki Kuga, master sculptor Sakurasaka Mikoto brings us the gorgeous Mai Tokiha!  This is a novel take on Mai from Ms. Sakurasaka's mind, slightly different from the usual design.  Taken as a set with her Natsuki Kuga, the Sakarasaka Mai-Hime world is sure to grow on any discerning collector.
name: Mai Tokiha (ときはまい)

description: Sculpted with soft, clear plastic in a open shirt, down to the last detail!
name: Mizuho Kazami (かざみみずほ)

subtitle: Here we have Genshiken's Kanako Ohno changing into a cosplay outfit!
description: Kanako Ohno is a cosplay maniac, shown here in the second GSC Genshiken figure in the middle of changing into her newest outfit.  Her bold and sexy pose is in sharp contrast to her usual shy and demure personality in this rare, mouth-watering gem.  In addition, her skirt can be replaced with a set of sheer pantyhose, for triple the fun!
name: Kanako Ohno (おおのかなこ)
copyright: © 2004 木尾士目・講談社 / 現視研研究会

subtitle: Sculpted using a scene from the 10th episode in the anime series "Don't Get Me Wet!!" All the heroines are in a bathing scene, don't miss it!
description: Following the "Onegai Taraku Collection", this is the second set of cute girl trading figures from Max Factory! From the comedy set in a Japanese temple, “Amaenaideyo!!" comes 6 of the girls in a bathing scene, as trading figures! Behind the stream, is everything the girls are trying to hide!
name: Collect500 Amaenaideyo (あまえないでよっ!!)
sculptor: Yuuji Kudou - Masanori Kuroda - Masato Kitade - Tetsuya Yamada
copyright: © 2005ボヘミアンK・宗我部としのり/ワニブックス・AT-X・VAP

subtitle: "No underwear?!"  Akiba Blog's popular character is here!
description: Akiba Blog, the popular site dealing with Akihabara culture, finally has a figure of its adorable mascot, Nerd-tan!  Looking like she sprang directly from the million-selling English trainer, Moetan, Nerd-tan is simply irresistible.  What's she got under her skirt?  find out for yourself!
name: Nerd-tan (なーど)

subtitle: Is there some magic that can make everybody happy?
description: From the popular anime "D.C.S.S (Da Capo Second Season)" comes a figure of Aishia! She's an incredibly kind girl, who is always hoping that everyone else will be happy. She's captured in a heartwarming, gentle spring scene of collecting sakura petals in her skirt. Feel free to decorate your desk with her beauty!Kotori Shirakawa from the same series will also be on sale soon!
name: Aishia (あいしあ)
copyright: © CIRCUS/ダ・カーポSS製作委員会

description: Nao
name: Nao (なお)
copyright: Developed by devCat Copyright (c) NEXON Corporation and NEXON Japan Co., Ltd. All rights reserved

subtitle: The first Nendoroid, Neko Arc, has finally returned!
description: Here we have the very first Nendoroid, the origin of the super-deformed sensation that's been sweeping the globe, back by popular demand for general sale!
name: Nendoroid Neko Arc : Convert! Mysterious Jet Flight Edition (ねこあるく　ねんどろいど 「かんそう！などのじぇっとひこう」へん)

description: Magical girl　Rin
name: Magical girl　Rin (まほうしょうじょ　りん)

subtitle: The first figure in the CAPCOM GIRL-FIGHTING series, Cammy!
description: From the popular designer "Kita Nishimura"!From the "GIRL-FIGHTING" representative illustration, comes a figure of Cammy! Sculptor "Chieri", being a fan of Nishimura, has faithfully reproduced the illustration as a figure! It's sculpting far beyond any normal figure. Enjoy Cammy's beautiful body!Other than Cammy, there are another two figures in the Kita Nishimura GIRL-FIGHTING series: Sakura, and Chun-Li are also planned for release.
name: Cammy (きゃみー)

subtitle: Equipped with the miraculous moment mechanism, the "super-movable joint"!
description: From the show with a cult-like following, "Godannar" which aired on TOKYO MX.TV, comes the Godannar itself as a brand new MAX Alloy figure.The Twin Drive Mode has been copied directly into a figure. It's so poseable, that it'll leave you thinking that it's not really made with alloy, it completely destroys any thoughts you had of alloy before - the super joints can even reproduce the various hand to hand battles showed in the anime.This is an example of a perfect alloy figure.
name: MAX Alloy: Godannar Twin Drive Mode (ごーだんなー)

subtitle: The second figure in the CAPCOM GIRL-FIGHTING series, Sakura!
description: From the popular designer "Kita Nishimura"!From the "GIRL-FIGHTING" representative illustration, comes a figure of Sakura! Based on the original illustrations of Kita Nishimura, the bright and cheerful Sakura has been sculpted by the super sculpting master "Chieri"! She's been displayed giving off a truly uplifting feeling; it's as if it simply jumped off the illustration itself.Other than Sakura, there are another two figures in the Kita Nishimura GIRL-FIGHTING series: Cammy, and Chun-Li, who is planned to be released.
name: Sakura (さくら)

description: Avp Alien Qeen
name: Avp Alien Qeen (えいりあんくぃーん　ゆるそふび)
series: エイリアンvsプレデター

subtitle: The third figure in the CAPCOM GIRL-FIGHTING series, Chun-Li!
description: Planned to be released in one month, following the releases of the two previous figures in the series "Cammy" and "Sakura" comes the popular "Chun-Li"! The powerful illustration of her has been recreated as figure, from her strong body to the pose in her finishing move the "Lightning Kick", it feels like she could come to life at any second! Be sure to collect all three gorgeous figures in the "Kita Nishimura Collection"!
name: Chun-Li (ちゅんりー)

subtitle: "I see. Very well then Kuro Daijuuji.  I will make a contract with you..."
description: It's been a PC game, manga, novel, PS2 game as well as an upcoming anime; "Demonbane" has been on all sorts of media. From the first of the games, "Zanmataisei Demonbane", comes a figurine of the main heroine "Al Azif". With an innocent, cute look, the figure shows the complete opposite of her true pompous, arrogant personality. Prototype sculptor Katou Taichi sculpted her as if she was suspiciously leaning against a wall in a dark alley. Also take note of her hair and ribbons gently blowing in the wind.
name: Al Azif (あるあじふ)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department - Takeshi Hamasaki - Atsushi Yagi

subtitle: Mai swoops down as another PVC figure.
description: Fuka Academy's 1st year in class 3, Mai Tokiha. She has a strong-willed, obstinate personality, but she's a very cheerful girl, she also acts as a mother for her younger brother.  Using that image, master sculptor Chieri has sculpted a large 1/6 scale figure of her.  Now you can also be soothed by her wonderful breasts.
name: Mai Tokiha (ときはまい)

description: AVP Celtic Predator
name: AVP Celtic Predator (けるてぃっくぷれでたー　ゆるそふび)
series: エイリアンvsプレデター

subtitle: Nendoroid Neko Arc : Convert! Grumbling Face Edition!
description: From Neko Arc comes a new edition of Nendoroid Neko Arc - this time with a grumbling expression!
name: Nendoroid Neko Arc : Convert! Grumbling Face Edition (ねんどろいど ねこあるく 「かんそう！ぶーぶーがお」へん)

subtitle: Guyver I's Giant Bioboosted Armor "Guyver Gigantic" is finally here!
description: Sho Fukumachi, the user of the Guyver I armor, made a silent prayer: "I want power to protect my friends from this enemy...!", and thus he received new power - the Guyver Gigantic.Just like the Gigantic Dark, there are parts to recreate the Giga Smasher, the High Frequency Swords, and the Gravity Ram - you can  recreate virtually all the techniques in the story with the included parts. All the parts to recreate scenes are included. You can also recreate the flying form of the Guyver Gigantic. It's truly a masterpiece of poseable action figures
name: Guyver Gigantic (がいばーぎがんてっく)

subtitle: "This is mother nature's punishment", she says brandishing her sacred sword "Father Bull".
description: From SNK's popular game "Samurai Shodown" comes the popular character, Nakoruru! The garage kit that was only released at events by Cerberus Project has now been sculpted as a complete painted PVC figure! The illustrator, Aoi Nanase, loves Nakoruru herself, and her illustration has been faithfully reproduced as a figure.The detail of her cloth clothes, her cute facial expression, and the feeling of motion that the figure produces, give it a wonderful balanced feeling.
name: Nakoruru (なこるる)
copyright:
© SNK PLAYMORE
※「サムライスピリッツ」は株式会社SNKプレイモアの登録商標です。

subtitle: The ferocious heroine can now fit in the palm of your hand!!
description: From the popular work "Toradora!" serialized in Dengeki Bunko, comes the "Palmtop Tiger" Taiga Aisaka. Using the front cover from the first volume as a model, she's been sculpted glaring ahead with a very cute, but angry look on her face. Lots of attention was paid on keeping the size of the figure right to fit her nickname of "Palmtop Tiger". The tiger in her own hands is another key point. If you put her on your desk, her cute but angry glare stares up at you... Make sure you get the "Palmtop Tiger" by your side too!
name: Taiga Aisaka (あいさか たいが)
copyright: © 竹宮ゆゆこ / メディアワークス

subtitle: The energetic girl who is off to rescue her master!
description: From the shooting game "Sengoku Canon - Sengoku Ace Episode III", a game thats even become popular in the figure world, comes a figure of the honest, energetic girl "Mizuka"! She was sculped with a childish face in mind, but she really has a very nice body.The figure was sculped by Sunny Day, from the popular sculpting group "Cerberus Project", it was based on a vivid, but cute illustration of Mizuka drawn by Shun Tsukasa. It's a masterpiece for any fan of the game!
name: Mizuka
series: Sengoku Blade - Sengoku Ace Episode III-

subtitle: Tiny and cute, they're back for another run!
description: The first Nendoroid Petite series, the Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya #01 set, has returned by popular demand!  From the mega-hit Haruhi anime, this figure set includes all the main characters in tiny, posable form, with plenty of detail to go around.  Fun to collect and cute as ever, collect all the Nendoroid trading figures!
name: Nendoroid Petite:  The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya #01 (すずみやはるひのゆううつ＃０１　ねんどろいど ぷち)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: An amazon.co.jp limited edition version of Revoltech Danbo!
description: Revoltech Danbo Amazon Box Version product page:  http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B000YW6UQ2
name: Revoltech Danbo Amazon Box Version (りぼるてっくだんぼー あまぞんぼっくすばーじょん)

subtitle: The strongest heroine and strongest Servant.
description: Saber, the main heroine of the PC game and anime Fate/stay night, needs no introduction, being among the best-loved characters of all time.  By popular request, this figure has been recommisioned for general distribution based on a limited edition kit by Taichi Katou.  Clad in her signature armor and swinging Excalibur through the air, Saber's impressive pose fits her status as the strongest Servant.  Even two years after its first appearance, this figure is often talked about and requested, and Good Smile is proud to bring the fans what they so desire.
name: Saber (せいばー)

subtitle: Innocence is bliss... the kind goddess.
description: Fauna, the second daughter in a family of three goddess', and from the popular PC game "Megachu!" has been sculpted in her casual clothes. Based on the one-piece dress she wore in the game,  Fauna's innocent personality is overflowing out of this figure. The pose that the character designer, Yousai Kuuchuu, originally designed, has now been brought to life. The clear plastic that is used for the one-piece dress is spectacular. Note that the new cast-off "Polo System" has also been used for this figure.
name: Fauna (ふぁうな)

subtitle: The new RNA figures from GENE!
description: Announcing a new series of figures as part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series brought to you by ATELIER-SAI.  Many popular manga artists and famous illustrators came together to illustrate these cute designs of girls, and each of their heads have been sculpted into a PVC art work. Using these figures, you can easily create dynamic poses and enjoy yourself.  As an added bonus you'll be able to create a figure of the alternate color version of "Shina", who was drawn by POP at a recent Summer event.  You can create Shina if you put all the bonus parts from the other figures together.
name: RNA (あーるえぬえー)

subtitle: Works hard, plays hard, especially at the beach!
description: As the anime nears its climax, Idolmaster Xenoglossia's swimsuit series continues with Iori Minase, a strong girl of cheery disposition with a charmingly exposed forehead.  Standing with beach ball in hand and wearing a sporty swimsuit that perfectly reflects her personality, Iori simply radiates youthful energy.  Now that all of Cherry Blossom's Xenoglossia swimsuit figures have been released, it would be cruel to keep them apart, wouldn't it?  Get them all together to make their fun day at the beach complete!
name: Iori Minase (みずせ いおり)
series: アイドルマスター XENOGLOSSIA(
copyright: © サンライズ・バンダイビジュアル

subtitle: An even cuter version of the navigator girl!
description: Nao, the popular and adorable navigator from the hit online game Mabinogi is the next to get the Nendoroid treatment!  The calming, sisterly atmosphere that surrounds her remains unchanged, but with a bevy of accessories including a winking face and arms with hands held in prayer, she's got double the charm of her more realistically proportioned version.  Her included pet owl has movable wings, and can even perch on top of her staff!  She's detailed too, in spite of her diminutive size, as evidenced by her clear skirt and expert sculpting, making her a perfect addition to any collection.
name: Nendoroid Nao (なお　ねんどろいど)
copyright:
Developed by devCat
Copyright (c) 2007 Nexon Corporation and Nexon Japan Co.,Ltd. All rights reserved.

subtitle: 5cm trading figures! Re-released due to popularity!!
description: The TV series has finished airing, but Lucky Star is still as popular as ever. These individual character trading figures have been re-released due to popularity. A conveniently sized Konata or Kagami can now cutely stand on your desk for you to enjoy. If you're waiting to see who the secret figure is, you're bound to be in for a surprise. Once you've collected them all, you can recreate the warm, fuzzy, relaxing atmosphere from the series!
name: Lucky Star Figure Collection (らき☆すた ふぃぎゅあこれくしょん)
copyright:
© 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす
※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Mankind's secret weapon that found its way into Skygirls!
description: The well-known "Vic Viper" from the Gradius game series recently made an appearance in the anime "Skygirls" as mankind's secret weapon. That Skygirls version of the Vic Viper has now been made into a plastic model kit. There shouldn't be many Gradius fans, new or old, who wouldn't want to get their hands on this. As an added bonus, a 1/60 scale Reijin and a non-scale GENEBLOCK version of Reijin have been included, so it'll also make Skygirls fans happy!
name: Vic Viper "Skygirls" Ver. (びっくばいぱー あにめ「すかいがーるず」ばん)
copyright: © 2007　Konami Digital Entertainment Co.Ltd/スカイガールズ製作委員会

subtitle: Merry Christmas he says, with a scheming face.
description: The popular Nendoroid Death Note series makes a special reappearance just in time for Christmas with the Nendoroid Light Yagami: Santa version!  Along with his usual scheming look, he's got another face that shows him surprised, a rare event in itself.  Of course, he has many other accessories and parts, including a big bag of presents, for the complete Christmas experience.  When paired with the Nendoroid L Reindeer version, which comes out simultaneously, Light makes a perfect Santa for a ridiculous Christmas scene.
name: Nendoroid Light Yagami : Santa Ver. (やがみらいと　さんたばーじょん　ねんどろいど)
copyright: ©大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ.Ｎ.ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: Soft and cute, you've got to love her!
description: The heart-rendingly adorable pair of Kotona and Rei Mii from the TV anime Zoids Genesis gets the Nendoroid treatment, with Kotona leading the way and Rei soon to follow.  As usual, she comes with several replacement parts, including a winking face and dancing legs, and she can be seated on her Zoid Rainbow Jerk, who makes an appearance in convenient Nendoroid size.  The Nendoroids just keep on coming, and they're cute as ever in this newest entry.
name: Nendoroid Kotona Elegance (ことな・えれがんす　ねんどろいど)
copyright:
© 1983 2007 TOMY
© ShoPro・TV Tokyo
ZOIDS is a trademark of TOMY Company,Ltd.and used under license.

subtitle: This reindeer's got a pallid complexion in place of the usual red nose.
description: The popular Nendoroid Death Note series makes a special reappearance just in time for Christmas with the Nendoroid L Reindeer version!  Along with his usual intense glare, he's got another face that shows his earnest desire to help out in any way he can, or maybe just an earnest desire to run away.  He's also got a sleigh to pull, though he doesn't look very happy to be pulling it, and can complete a very silly Christmas scene when displayed with Nendoroid Shinigami Light's Santa version, which comes out simultaneously.
name: Nendoroid L Reindeer Version (える　となかいばーじょん　ねんどろいど)
copyright: ©大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ.Ｎ.ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: The humanoid interface's charming figure. Re-released due to popularity.
description: "Yuki Nagato Bunny Ver." as part of the Big Bunny Series, has been re-released due to it's popularity! Even in a bunny girl suit, her face is as expressionless as ever. She's glowing with beauty in her slender standing pose. Standing on her long charming legs make her the tallest figure in the Big Bunny series. The net tights have once again been made with a realistic feeling to them. When all of the Big Bunny figures are displayed together, it creates a truly unbelievable display. Discover a whole new world of figures when you complete this gorgeous collection.
name: Yuki Nagato Bunny Ver. (ながとゆき ばにーばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: A talking nendoroid has arrived as an extra!
description: From the popular PC game and anime "Shuffle!"!. Modelled off the special edition desktop accessory that was released with the anime DVD, comes a new game which stars the popular "younger sister" character "Primula"!. You control the little Primula in her adventures to all kinds of worlds.
name: Primula's Little Big Adventure!? (ぷりむらのちっちゃなだいぼうけん！？)
copyright:
© 2007 Omegavision,Inc./SHUFFLE! Media Partners
© オリゴクレース・FREEing

subtitle: The girl with the crimson eyes, and hair.
description: A second season of the anime will start airing from this autumn! From the series "Shakugan no Shana" comes a figure of the main heroine Shana, the "Flame-Haired Burning-Eyed Hunter". Her hair is sculpted from a clear plastic, and she is pointing out her finger in an awe-inspiring pose.  Both her katana "Nietono no Shana", held her other hand,  as well as her pendant known as the Cocytus have been faithfully reproduced. Basing the figure on Noizi Ito's original illustration,  the attractive Flame Haze Shana has been completed.
name: Shana (しゃな)
copyright: © 高橋弥七郎・メディアワークス/『灼眼のシャナ』製作委員会

subtitle: By popular demand, the graceful kenpo master is back!
description: Another run of the second Shuraki Trinity Box was inevitable, due to its remarkable popularity, and now it's finally come to pass!  With a figure, CD and booklet included, this trifecta of Shuraki goodness is certain to cast a spell on you!
name: Shuraki Trinity Box 02 - Ryu Meifen (りう めいふぇん)

subtitle: A cheery girl with ribbons in her hair!
description: Based on the hit mixed-media property Idolmaster, Idolmaster Xenoglossia puts the heroines in the cockpits of giant robots called Idols.  In this adorable figure, one of the pilots, Haruka Amami, is posed in a cute, very girly swimsuit holding her beloved penguin-shaped cell phone.  Her innocent and perky pose simply radiates an angelic charm, and together with her classmates Yukiho Hagiwara (Sculptor: Miki Sakurazaka), and Iori Minase (Sculptor: Toria), she's looking to establish quite a reputation for Cherry Blossom's swimsuit series.
name: Haruka Amami (あまみ はるか)
series: アイドルマスター XENOGLOSSIA
copyright: © サンライズ・バンダイビジュアル

subtitle: The mysterious class rep.
description: As a part of the "Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" figure series, comes Ryouko Asakura! As the beautiful, well-mannered, honors student that she is, she has been sculpted as if she was on her way to school, carrying her bag.  She is shown with a soft smile, displaying her charming legs. There are also interchangeable parts! You can make her hold the knife that fans know so well, instead of the bag she is taking to school. That same soft smile can be dangerous as well...
name: Ryouko Asakura (あさくらりょうこ)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: A distinctly Japanese girl to quench your Nendoroid thirst!
description: Based on the popular and heart-warming story Binchou-tan, the girl herself is a personification of a bundle of charcoal, and an adorable one at that!  In Nendoroid form, Binchou-tan's kimono-clad figure can be posed in many different ways, and comes with normal and crying faces as well as a special sighing face designed by Takahito Ekusa, the creator, especially for this figure.  Also included is Binchou-tan's favourite TV character, Pukashuu, a hearth and a dining table complete with bowl of rice.
name: Nendoroid Binchou-tan (びんちょうたん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 江草天仁・Alchemist/「びんちょうタン」製作委員会

subtitle: She's just thrilled to be out riding her bike!
description: The Fate Nendoroids just keep on coming with Bicycling Rider, the third figure based on illustrations by Tsukurimonoji.  She comes with three faces, one smiling, one blank, and one with glasses, as well as a bicycle, as the name implies.  Using the two included stands, Rider and her ride can be posed separately or together, and she can even pop a wheelie using the support bar.  Especially when displayed with the previously released Lazy Sakura and Saber, Rider is sure to renew any Fate fan's affection for the characters.
name: Nendoroid Bicycling Rider (ちゃりんこらいだー　ねんどろいど)

subtitle: "Because you're there, gazing up at the clouds."
description: From the 5th installment in the popular RPG series "Wild Arms" comes the heroine, Yulie Ahtreide.  Based the original illustrations by Ooba Wakako, she has been sculpted frisking along the beach. It shows her calm, kind side, that isn't very good with strangers. She is posed as if she was in motion, with a beautiful smile on her face.
name: Yulie Ahtreide (ゆうりぃ・あーとれいで)

subtitle: The big, mega awesome Tsuruya-san!. Re-released due to popularity.
description: The third figure in "The Melancholy Of Haruhi Suzumiya" Big Bunny series, is Mikuru Asahina's classmate "Tsuruya-san Bunny Ver.", and it has been re-released due to it's popularity! She's standing in a seductive pose, wearing the popular net tights used with all the previous figures. Her charming vampire tooth is visible, and her expression is adorable. Her long hair extends down to her legs, and for the first time in this series of figures, she also comes with her own stand. We hope you enjoy the amazing Tsuruya-san!
name: Tsuruya-san Bunny Ver. (つるやさん ばにーばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The space pirate drawn by Masamune Shirow
description: The creator of the world famous "Ghost in the Shell" series, Masamune Shirow. His forth art book entitled "INTRON DEPOT 4 BULLETS" has has a tonne of diehard fans, and it included an illustration of this masterpiece, which has now been sculpted into a figure! Masamune Shirow's characteristic, elaborate illustration has been faithfully reproduced as a figure. This differently colored RED ver. will be put on sale at the same time.
name: INTRON DEPOT #4 Space Pirates RED Ver. (いんとろんでぽ４ すぺーすぱいれーつ れっどばーじょん)

subtitle: The miracle of having met that girl, in the snow covered town.
description: From the adult PC game "Kanon", comes the story's key heroine, "Ayu Tsukimiya".  Different to the normal cheerful, energetic feel of the character, she was sculpted with a more serious, fragile image in mind. The figure aims for a feeling straight from the world of the game. Two removable parts that can be attached to Ayu's back are included: the "winged version", which was modeled off the opening movie, and the "backpack with wings version" that fans should be familiar with.  Get a hold of the figure to feel the magical ambiance it gives off.
name: Ayu Tsukimiya (つきみやあゆ)

subtitle: Her transformed form is also filled with adult flair!
description: From the magical girl show with a difference "My Wife is a Magical Girl", comes Ureshiko Asaba's transformed form, Agnes Bell!She came from the magical world of Realm in order to protect the old fashioned castle town of Wonderland.  The figure is crammed with the charm of a 27 year old magical girl, wearing a distinctly designed costume and with a bold bodyline.
name: Agnes Bell (あにえす・べる)
series: My Wife is a Magical Girl
copyright: © 2005 J.C.STAFF・錦織博・池口和彦/奥さまは魔法少女製作委員会

subtitle: The space pirate drawn by Masamune Shirow
description: The creator of the world famous "Ghost in the Shell" series, Masamune Shirow. His forth art book entitled "INTRON DEPOT 4 BULLETS" has has a tonne of diehard fans, and it included an illustration of this masterpiece, which has now been sculpted into a figure!Masamune Shirow's characteristic, elaborate illustration has been faithfully reproduced as a figure.
name: INTRON DEPOT#4 Space Pirates (いんとろんでぽ４ すぺーすぱいれーつ)

subtitle: The great hero! Standing an incredible metre high!
description: A new comrade has come to join the popular Gigabyte soft vinyl figure series! The forth in the series is the "Great Mazinger"! And it's standing higher than all the others in the series - an incredible metre in height!  The Brain Condor on the head is removable, so you can reproduce the "Fire, On!" scenes!Just like the other figures in the series, both arms, the neck, and the ankles are moveable, and in addition the wrists and elbows also have ball joints, allowing for even more poses!
name: Gigabyte Great Mazinger (ぎがばいと ぐれーとまじんがー)

subtitle: MAZINGER1901 has evolved into EX Alloy!
description: The action figure series that makes use of Yasushi Nichisawa's special designs - "MAZINGER 1901" has reawakened after 5 years of silence, and this time it's using EX Alloy! Finally we see BOSS BOROT making an appearance, Boss is sitting in the head controlling the robot, while Mucha and Nuke are sitting in the cockpit jail in the torso. There are replaceable parts to replace both hands with either a Megaton Hammer or a Megaton Smasher. The normal colored version will have limited stock and sold directly by Fewture Direct, while this silver version that uses Yasushi Nichisawa's colors will be sold in stores. Displaying this figure together with "DOUBLAS", will let you enjoy the powerful presence that they generate together.
name: EX Alloy BOSS BOROT Silver Ver. (えくすごうきん ぼすぼろっと しるばーばーじょん)

subtitle: MAZINGER1901 has evolved into EX Alloy!
description: The long-awaited DOUBLAS has been released in EX Alloy!Based on the design by Yasushi Nichisawa, the two-headed DOUBLAS has been sculpted with a creature-like appearance, Ashura can be seen inside the openable cockpit. It's an elaborate, profound and rather bizarre figure from Fewture Models! Both Scissors Hands can be replaced with a Grind Cutter or a Killer Drill. The normal colored version will be sold directly by Fewture Direct, while this silver version which uses Yasushi Nichisawa's colors will be sold in stores. Displaying this figure together with "BOSS BOROT", will let you enjoy the powerful presence that they generate together.
name: EX Alloy DOUBLAS Silver Ver. (えくすごうきん だぶらす しるばーばーじょん)

subtitle: Shining Project. A new touching series.
description: The "Shining Project" never ends! Continuing the popular "Shining Tears" series, comes the recently released sequel "Shining Wind", and from it comes a figure of the shining sun maiden, Kureha!She has been sculpted with a quiet and calm personality, but with true strength inside her, just as the original illustration by Tony showed. Her costume has been recreated in vivid color, without flaw, so there is no doubt that the fans will love this one.
name: Kureha (くれは)

subtitle: Stylish classmates come together!
description: Based on the currently airing TV anime Idol Master Xenoglossia and a part of the same series as the previously released Haruka Amamiya, this figure by master sculptor Miki Sakurazaka wears a bold bikini which goes totally against her normally chaste personality.  Holding her sandals in one hand, the radiantly beautiful Yukiho stands by the water's edge with a calm look in her eyes.  Together with Haruka and the soon to be released Iori Minase, the Idol Master swimsuit girls are ready to take on a fun day at the beach!
name: Yukiho Hagiwara (はぎわら ゆきほ)
copyright: © サンライズ・バンダイビジュアル

subtitle: "Let's make some flowers bloom, together."
description: As a part of Max Factory's "Gun X Sword" figure series, comes one of the original seven - Fasalina!. She has been sculpted in a position where she is placing her weapon between her breasts, which brings out her erotic charm to the maximum. The stand is created off the image of the Armour that she rides, "Dahlia of Wednesday". It's a figure that Gun X Sword fans have long been waiting for, be sure to get your hands on it!
name: Fasalina (ふぁさりな)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: Ever industrious, even in her lazy version, it's Nendoroid Sakura!
description: The second in Tsukurimonoji's super deformed Fate character series, this time it's Sakura Matou that gets the lazy treatment.  The latest in the soft and cute Nendoroid series, Lazy Sakura features two extra faces, one consternated and the other worried, as well as a bevy of parts including her familiars and her ever-present shopping bag.  This flood of adorable characters is bound to satisfy all who hunger for more Nendoroid goodness.
name: Nendoroid Lazy Sakura (へたれさくら)

subtitle: The No.1 grade school student has also been re-released!
description: As part of FREEing's "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" Big Bunny Series comes Kyon's Little Sister in a super cute pink bunny girl outfit. She has been re-released by your request! Even being the little sister, she still calls her brother by his nickname - she's a grade school girl who would chat to anyone who seems like a friend. She's a bit young for net tights, but her innocent charm is just as captivating without them. She comes with 2 types of left hand parts that can be switched. If you haven’t bought this one yet, don't miss this opportunity! Aim to collect the whole series!
name: Kyon's Little Sister Bunny Ver. (きょんのいもうと ばにーばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: Bring everyone to the "Magical Girls Club"!
description: As a spin off to the original "Tenchi Muyo" series, we got "Sasami: Magical Girls Club", a completely original full length anime series that gained a tonne of fans because of the cute girls! From those girls, we bring you both Sasami Iwakura, and Misao Shinohara, in a beautifully sculpted set. Using original illustrations as a basis, these two innocent girls have been sculpted in an energetic, fun pose, using soft colors. Ryo-Ohki, the series' mascot is also included, so fans of the series are bound to love this figure.
name: Sasami & Misao (ささみ＆みさお)

subtitle: Neo Venezia's most graceful gondolier.
description: Alicia Florence is a Prima undine known throughout Aqua as Snow White. She is one of the three Water Fairies, and the most popular gondolier in the city.  Based on "Aria the Natural", the new OVA that was released last fall, this rendition of Alicia is AT-G's newest project. Her smiling face and natural elegance show that her popularity is well deserved.  With the Aria company president sitting next to her, this figure creates a calm feeling recognizable across the room.
name: Alicia Florence (ありしあ・ふろーれんす)
copyright: © 2006 天野こずえ/マッグガーデン・ARIAカンパニー

subtitle: Finally, a PVC figure based on Kiminozo!
description: The first PVC figure from Age's popular game Kimi ga Nozomu Eien, Ms. Haruka Suzumiya is based on a limited-edition kit from a previous convention.  Posed on the sandy pedestal to accentuate her gorgeous body and playful bikini with a smile on her face, this carefully sculpted rendition is so detailed as to seem almost alive.
name: Haruka Suzumiya (すずみや はるか)
series: Kimi ga Nozomu Eien (The Eternity You Desire)

subtitle: My Ghost is whispering...
description: With two movies and two TV anime series already out, it's quite a surprise that Ghost in the Shell has never been made into an OVA until now.  From the new OVA Ghost in the Shell S.A.C Solid State Society comes Major Motoko Kusanagi, chief of Public Safety Section 9.  Smooth and sexy in her new suit and holding her sunglasses in a defiant pose, the Major makes an incredibly impressive figure.  Her perfect proportions are bound to look great on any collector's shelf.
name: Motoko Kusanagi (くさなぎ　もとこ)
series: Ghost in the Shell S.A.C. Solid State Society
copyright: © 2006 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: The twin-bladed beauty is back again!
description: First in the Shuraki Trinity Box series, this collection of three collector's items has returned for another run!  With a figure, drama CD and art booklet, this original character and her accompanying articles are certain to make a fan of you!
name: Shuraki Trinity Box 01 - Mishiro Akatsuki (みしろ あかつき しゅらき)

subtitle: The ninja maid in extra-special 1/5th scale!
description: From the popular fighting game Samurai Spirits, Warriors of Heaven and Earth, comes Iroha, the very personification of the perfect maid.  Sculpted by Eiji Nakayama from the popular dealer Tetsukoryuu, Iroha dances gracefully with her signature weapons, Hourin and Ousai.  Though many figures have featured Iroha, this is truly the definitive version.
name: Iroha (いろは)
series: サムライスピリッツ天下一剣客伝
copyright:
© SNK PLAYMORE
　 ｢サムライスピリッツ｣は株式会社SNKプレイモアの登録商標です。

subtitle: Resurrect the fated "Battle Of The Heterogeneous Species".
description: From the OVA "Battle Of The Heterogeneous Species", there was a fated battle between two AT's: the Light Scopedog & Ecrevisse. They're now available as a set in the 35MAX series! Taking pride in the poseability of the figures, the right arm of the Ecrevisse features a pile bunker, and the left arm has a missile battery, and a giant claw.  Opposing that is the lightly armoured Light Scopedog. This addition to the 35MAX series has movable target lenses. Look forward to the next 35MAX series!
name: 5MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 07 Light Scopedog & Ecrevisse (らいとすこーぷどっく＆えくるびす)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department - Daiichi Endou - Miyuki Uehara

subtitle: Nendoroid L is back, and just as dark-eyed and bent-backed as always!
description: Back by popular demand is the Nendoroid version of L, the best detective in the world and fated rival of main character Light Yagami.  With a smiling, surprised and pouting face, not to mention his signature chair, Nendoroid L is perfectly suited to reproducing any scene from the TV show in ridiculously cute proportions.  Naturally, his unique mannerisms, like the way he sits or holds his cell phone, are reproducible with the assortment of extra parts, and he can even be chained to his rival Nendoroid L with the included handcuffs.  Now the Death Note world is yours to play with!
name: Nendoroid L
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: Everyone's favorite, Misamisa, is here as a Nendoroid!
description: As the Death Note anime reaches its thrilling conclusion, this Nendoroid figure of Amane Misa, or Misamisa, as she likes to be called, is here to bowl you over with her gothic lolita outfit and assortment of adorable expressions.  You can make her smile, make her mad, make her blush, or just make her your own with all the parts and faces that come with her.  Put her next to her beloved Light and make her extra happy!
name: Nendoroid Misa Amane (Misa Amane Nendoroid)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: It's Mikuru, back by popular demand!
description: Asahina Mikuru's Nendoroid figure is back by popular demand, and just as adorable as ever!  Dressed in her waitress' uniform from the anime's episode 0, entitled "Asahina Mikuru's Adventures Episode 00", she features three faces, one smiling, one troubled, and one angry, which, when combined with her numerous bonus parts, allow for a perfect recreation of her many poses, including the Mikuru Beam attack from the show.  Assemble all the Haruhi Nendoroids and remake any scene with an extra-cute veneer!
name: Nendoroid Mikuru Asahina (あさひなみくる ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

description: The base of this figure has been made to give the feel of a wedding ceremony - a walk down the aisle of faith! The dog holding a card in it's mouth is also included.
name: Azusa Miura - "The Hour of Destiny" (みうらあずさ うんめいのとき)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The third Ikkitousen figure based on illustrations by Shiozaki-sensei!
description: The new series of the popular Ikkitousen anime series is currently being broadcast. This figure series is based on the illustrations and supervision of Shiozaki-sensei, who has become a familiar face in the wani books magazine. Finally we see the third figure in the series arriving. The last in the series is Kanu Unchou, and she comes wrapped in her white gothloli style clothes whilst, as usual,  holding her weapon "Reienkyo" in her hand. She's in a crouched position, and if you peek under her fluttering dress you can see the beauty of her leg lines. If you display all three of the figures together it's three times as beautiful! Make sure you collect the whole collection!
name: Comic Gum Figure Collection: Kanu Unchou  (White Gothloli Ver.) (こみっくがむふぃぎゅあこれくしょん かんううんちょう（しろご)

subtitle: A persocom in a maid outfit. Comes with point and tell action.
description: From the series Chobits, created by the popular manga artist group CLAMP, comes the relaxing Chii, who has once again been sculpted in a new pose and a new costume as part of the LILICS series of figures. She's in an adorable pose - pointing toward her mouth really pulls out her cute charm. Her long hair and sexy legs give the figure a supple, dynamic feel. You'll notice the incredible detail on her frilly skirt and net tights the second you lay eyes on her.
name: Chii: Maid Alice (ちぃめいどありす)
copyright: © CLAMP・講談社／ちょびっツ製作委員会

subtitle: The popular King of Fighter's character Mai Shiranuki has finally been made into a figure!
description: At the 2006 WonFes, this Mai Shiranuki figure from King Of Fighters was only sold as a garage kit. Due to the demand for the figure, Max Factory has now released a complete figure! Using Kita Nishimura's original illustrations from "CAPCOM VS. SNK2", prototype sculptor Takeshi Hamasaki has sculpted the figure with the utmost respect. Even Nishimura himself is praising the figure. Max Factory brings you a powerful figure on a grand new scale.
name: Kita Nishimura Collection: Mai Shiranui (しらぬいまい)
copyright:
© CAPCOM CO., Ltd. 2000 ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
© SNKPLAYMORE
※「CAPCOM VS. SNK 2 」は一部（株）SNKプレイモアの許諾を受けて、（株）カプコンが製造・販売するものです。
※「SNK」は、（株）SNKプレイモアの登録商標です。

subtitle: Sculpted from a special ecchi illustration!!
description: A part of the "Softmap Exclusive" series of figures, which are based on special illustrations from popular PC games. The first figure is based on a very bold illustration of Mao Shingyouji from the popular Front Wing game "Boy Meets Girl", it was originally used for a dakimakura cover. She has been sculpted without hiding anything, showing her full round breasts with an embarrassed expression - just like the original illustration! If you take off the removable skirt parts, you’ll see that you can make an even more audacious pose! Whether you loved the dakimakura or not, this is one figure anyone will appreciate.
name: Mao Shingyouji (しんぎょうじ まお)

description: Safety first! The understanding Yellow Body!
name: Tachikoma Soft Vinyl Figure: Yellow Ver. (たちこま そふびふぃぎゅあ たちいえろーばーじょん)
copyright: © 士郎正宗・Production I.G/講談社・攻殻機動隊製作委員会

subtitle: Both her size and her attitude are on a new scale!! Re-released due to popularity!
description: The last of FREEing's "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya" Big Bunny Series is finally here with the release of Ryouko Asakura, and in addition to that, the SOS Brigade's leader Haruhi Suzumiya has also been re-released!She is dressed in a black costume with bunny ears on her head, and net tights lining her legs. But even wearing that, she's got a happy smile lining her face, showing no embarrassment, just like Haruhi would!You'll want to experience the overwhelming presence this huge figure gives!
name: Haruhi Suzumiya Bunny Ver. (すずみやはるひ　ばにーばーじょん)
copyright:
© 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団
※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: The 3rd figure from the "Shining Project"! The Dragon God priestess.
description: Following the "Elwyn" and "Blanc Neige" figures that are already on sale, comes the third figure from the "Shining Project"! - The priestess Ryuna, who worships the Dragon God! With long black hair and a white swimsuit that comtrast each other perfectly, and a face that was sculpted exactly as the original illustration looked. She's got s slim build, but be sure to notice her abundant bust, as well as her captivating hip line! Her delicate fingers also had great care put into them, and for the third time the series character designer Tony has been happy with the finished product!
name: Ryuna (りゅうな)

subtitle: A limited color edition of a PSE product!
description: The front cover illustration for the June 2002 volume of Kairakuten Magazine has been sculpted into a figure!The sculpted design was created with cooperation from the original illustrator Murata-sensei.This is a repeat version of the previous ribbon style figure, with a different head accessory and a new set of colors.
name: ribbon style "Limited Color Edition" (りぼんすたいる「りみてっどからーえでぃしょん」)

subtitle: Meiya Mitsurugi! Finally made into a cute PVC figure.
description: Here we have a lovely rendition of Meiya Mitsurugi from the cult favorite Muv-Luv Alternative in her first-ever PVC figure!  With her sword the Minaru Kamui in her hand, face tensed and at the ready, this master of the Mark Zero Protective Armor certainly makes an impression.  Close supervision by the character's creators make this a cool yet graceful, detailed rendition of the beloved character in her form-fitting combat uniform.  Look forward to more figures from this series, including Kasumi Yashiro and Sumika Kagami!
name: Meiya Mitsurugi (みつるぎ めいや)

subtitle: The rose buds bound by the rosary.
description: From a novel, to a manga, to an anime and then even to an OVA, “Maria Watches Over Us" has spread to all different kinds of media and picked up more and more fans along the way. These trading figures of sculpted after the "Sœur" - sisters from the Lillian Girls' Private Academy, who swore themselves to each other though a pledge. Together with their stand, each Sœur recreates a specific scene. The figures allow you to feel the bonds between the older and younger sisters of the pledge. Collect the whole collection so each of the girls can pair up with their partners.
name: "Maria Watches Over Us" Sœur Diorama Collection (「まりあさまがみてる」すーるびねっとこれくしょん)
copyright: © 今野緒雪/集英社・山百合会

subtitle: Commando Vorct's weapon set is here! Bokmessa, Zetra and Volk's AT's can now be created!
description: The weapon set for the 35MAX Commander Vorct series has arrived. If used together with the "Nolden Custom" that went on sale at the same time, you can recreate the AT's of the remaining three members of the team.Bokmessa's anti-material cannon, pentatrooper and spade ( which supports the AT with a flexible movement system). Zetra's personal sniper rifle and large target visor, and Volk's lightweight shoulder and torso armour. They're all included in the set.To truly be able to recreate all of the members of Unit 6 at once, it's recommended you buy 4 "Nolden Customs".
name: 5MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES CV-04 Commando Vorct Weapon Set (こまんどふぉーくと うえぽんせっと)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Atsushi Yagi)

subtitle: The worthy sub-commander. The ace of mid-class ATs, Major Nolden.
description: From the original story currently serialized in Hobby Japan magazine: "Armoured Trooper Votoms: Commando Vorct", comes Major Nolden's AT, the "Nolden Custom".In order to increase the fundamental ability of the team, unit 6 applied adjustments to the Scopedog, and when they were done, nothing but the original shape remained the same. This is the first figure in the 35MAX series to include a parachute sack.There are removable parts just like the other AT's in the series -  by using the weapon set that went on sale at the same time as this figure, you can recreate the AT's of the other 3 members of the unit. In a way, this is an all purpose AT.
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES CV-03 Commando Vorct Scopedog Nolden Custom (こまんどふぉーくと すこーぷどっく のるでんかすたむ)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Atsushi Yagi)

subtitle: Finally the fabled lingerie warrior has been made into a figure!!!
description: This anime was originally released to the public as an ONA, and it was quickly accessed over 500000 times online. Fansites were even made outside of Japan. Because of this boom in popularity, a real OVA was created, but only one volume of six planned volumes was ever released. It's the mystical anime "Lingerie Soldier Papillon Rose"!  The heroine with the unbelievable career, "Papillon Rose" has been sculpted into a compelling figure. She is smiling happily in a sexy costume that will enchant anyone who looks at her. Enjoy the detailed work that went into this masterpiece!
name: Papillon Rose (ぱぴよんろーぜ)
series: ランジェリー戦士パピヨンローゼ

subtitle: "Mi-Mi-Mikuru Beam!"
description: The second figure in "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" figure series, Mikuru Asahina. but this time she's available in a special "Mikuru Asahina: Mikuru Beam!" version, which will only be sold through the Good Smile Online shop. She has a colored contact lens in her left eye,  so now she really is about to shoot the Mikuru Beam!! Trying her best to be useful, Mikuru stands valiantly, unintentionally letting a tear loose. It's a collector's item for any Mikuru fan.
name: Mikuru Asahina: Mikuru Beam! Ver. (あさひなみくる みくるびーむ)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The silent humanoid interface.
description: The third figure in "The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi" figure series, and the last of the three SOS Brigade girls, Yuki Nagato is finally here! She's been sculpted along with her witch's hat, mantle and magical want "Starling Inferno", just as she looked in the play "The Adventures of Mikuru Asahina". Her expressionless face is as suspicious as it is cute, which is very much like Yuki. Not to mention, that if you remove these extra, you can get Yuki in her school uniform, something any fan would want! The figure gives a completely different impression without the extras! You can enjoy both of the two versions, the "Evil Witch version" and the "School Uniform ver". A single price for twice the beauty!
name: Yuki Nagato (ながとゆき)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団

subtitle: The 4th Figure from the "Shining Project"! The Fire Assassin.
description: Yet another figure from the "Shining Project"! The Fire Assassin Mao, released in a swimsuit to keep to the tradition! She's got an incredibly healthy looking body, as one would expect of a beast woman. She's also got supple arms and legs to boot, and she's got her characteristic cat ears.  She was sculpted in a way to draw out as much charm as possible from a woman from the beast quarter. It's a reproduction of Tony's original illustration. This is a figure for fans of the game, fans of Tony, or just simply figure fans!
name: Mao (まお)

subtitle: The Roanapur Assassin, who struggles to use English.
description: From the popular serialization in Monthly Sunday Gene-X, "Black Lagoon", comes the freelance assassin Shenhua. Based off the front cover of the 4th volume, this figure has been beautifully sculpted into a true masterpiece.  Displayed with thin, fine hair and a long flowing Chinese dress - which you can peek under to reveal her lovely legs. She's armed with a kukuri, which is also beautifully detailed. You'll feel her silent intent to kill underneath her calm smile.
name: Shenhua (しぇんふぉあ)
copyright: © 広江礼威・小学館/BLACKLAGOON製作委員会

subtitle: Reprinted to accompany the new addition to the series!
description: This lovely figure has been reprinted by popular demand to coincide with the new Modest Fantasy Maid version of Rider.  With her long, sweeping skirt and perky pose, this figure manages to capture Rin's cheery disposition, and gives off a feeling of nobility that shines through her humble maid's outfit.  Even under her skirt, this detailed rendition takes pains to recreate the feeling she gives off throughout the second Fate game.  A beautiful figure and the perfect complement to the other two Fate maids.
name: Rin Tohsaka ~Precious Fantasy Maid Version~ (とおさかりん もうそう たからかなめいどへん)

subtitle: The newest PSE product is here!
description: The front cover illustration for the June 2002 volume of Kairakuten Magazine has been sculpted into a figure!The sculpted design was created with cooperation from the original illustrator Murata-sensei.
name: ribbon style (りぼんすたいる)

subtitle: The Deathscythe, Kira's image item has been made into a silver accessory!
description: The symbol of Shinigami Light, Kira's Deathscythe from the mega-hit anime Death Note is now a silver accessory brought to you by Good Smile.  The latest in the lauded high-quality sterling silver jewellery collection, this cast silver piece is the spitting image of the real thing, but in a convenient size perfect for a stylish necklace.  Any fan of Death Note should take note of this spetacular product!
name: Kira's Deathscythe Pendant (きらのですさいずぺんだんと)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: A heart-warming story told in a rural town
description: Hayami Kohinata, a heroine in the popular PC game H2O ~ Footprints in the Sand, comes to you courtesy of Good Smile!  This classic beauty with long, dark hair is usually unsociable and a little bit mean, but all that is really just a front which conceals her true, kind nature.  Her form-fitting dress and hairpin, which holds great sentimental value to her, really illustrate this hidden gentle side, and the expert sculpting surounds her with a truly extraordinary atmosphere.
name: Hayami Kohinata (こひなた はやみ)

subtitle: 33cm tall! A large soft vinyl figure of this loveable character!!
description: Even though the anime ended in 2003, "Please! Twins" is still popular.
